title: Riot Leona
body:
I saw this skin pop up a few times so I am re-posting it here to gain awareness!

This skin would be AMAZING for Leona. Especially if she had a stun-rod as her weapon. 

**Q** Emits a static shock that stuns her opponents
**W** Blue and Red lights go off on her shield (siren included)
**E** Stun rod extends and zaps the targets in a line
**R** Leona Calls in a helicopter that shines search lights down on a target location

What other thoughts do you guys have???

{{champion:89}} RITO PLEASE!{{champion:89}}

(artist's tumblr: http://umisaru.tumblr.com)
